Detailed Description

template<typename T1, typename T2>
struct geometry::calculation_traits< T1, T2 >

Combination of select_type_traits and large_type_traits for convenience.

Selects the most appropriate type for calculation on two values of possibly different type, and making them larger if necessary to avoid overflow.

Note:
Maybe this class can be replaced by the new (accepted?) promotion_traits class of boost.

Member Typedef Documentation

template<typename T1 , typename T2 >
typedef large_type_traits<typename select_type_traits<T1, T2>::type> geometry::calculation_traits< T1, T2 >::type
